item.title: My summary of DDD Europe 2018
item.description: Well, that was a blast. DDD Europe 2018 is already over. And I loved it! Because I had lovely conversations, great insights and good learnings, I had the idea to create a summary, mostly for myself. Pre conference workshop DIY Event Sourcing Tooling A pre conference workshop by Marijn Huizendveld on Tuesday and Wednesday. This workshop about making your own event sourcing tooling was not exactly what I expected it to be.
